net.marfgamer.jraknet.example.chat

Class ServerChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.marfgamer.jraknet.example.chat.ServerChannel

  • public class ServerChannel
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a channel on a ChatServer, used by both the ChatServer and ChatClient to manage the chat rooms.
    Author:
    Trent "MarfGamer" Summerlin
